cause.description:
Please join me in the fight to end poverty, and to make thos who do see what is happening around the world that they live in.
Sign on and even get involved in your community to find a soultion to this problem.
Donate money to help end poverty for once.
1. Poverty must be abolished
2. Children don't deserve to live like this
3. Give every a fair chance to live
cause.name: POVERTY
